description:
Elevation gain: 700ft
Short climb to an old forestry lookout site close to Smithers. This trail goes through 3 private properties. Use the foot gates and close the gates behind you. The trail first crosses a large farm, then heads into the forest after the next gate. It climbs up 500ft and the crosses a farm road. Follow the road to another gate and then climb up the last hill to the communication tower and picnic table on top. (at 9 U 621028 6077757).
More views at view of Hudsons Bay Mountain at Smithers.
directions:
Take McCabe road on left. After about 2km there is a parking area on the left just across from the Logpile Lodge. Use the gate to enter onto the trail, close it behind you. Do not litter, cows don't like it in their hay.
[Advertisement]Near this trail is a new accommodation at Chickadee Acres Bed and Breakfast where you have a comfortable bedroom with views of the mountains, more trails to hike or ski starting from the house and it is a bird watchers paradise.
title: Malkow Lookout
